entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:49 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
